name: Island of Evil
description:
In 1944... during World War II United States Navy had sent many battleships

to join wars against Japanese armies. Many US ships were sunk by Japanese and all the crews died...

Except... one man.

Deen was the only survivor.

The storm took him to an unknown island..

An island full of secrets and mysteries..

An island where no one dare to go..

.....ISLAND OF EVIL

________________________________

DELUXE EDITION 

You will recieve theses items from the start of the game:

1. A Survival Pack  ( Medkit x2 White Pill x2 Blue Pill x4 Herb x4 )

2. A Special Weapon 'Murasame'

3. A Special Weapon 'Masamune'
